edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.utility

Class StreamUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.utility.StreamUtility

  • public class StreamUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains various static functions for querying and manipulating filtered chain complexes.
    Author:
    Andrew Tausz

      • getBoundaryMatrixColumns

        public static <R,T> java.util.List<edu.stanford.math.primitivelib.autogen.formal_sum.ObjectSparseFormalSum<R,T>> getBoundaryMatrixColumns(AbstractFilteredStream<T> stream,
                                                                                                                          int dimension,
                                                                                                                          edu.stanford.math.primitivelib.autogen.formal_sum.ObjectAlgebraicFreeModule<R,T> chainModule)
        This function produces a list of formal sums which are the columns of the boundary matrix at the requested dimension.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the ring in which to compute
        T - the type of the basis elements
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to perform the operation on
        dimension - the dimension
        chainModule - the module which performs the algebraic operations (forming the sums)
        Returns:
        the columns of the boundary matrix at the request dimension

      • getNeighborhoodGraph

        public static UndirectedListGraph getNeighborhoodGraph(AbstractFilteredStream<Simplex> stream,
                                       int minFiltrationIndex)
        This function returns a graph containing the 1-skeleton of a given filtered simplicial complex. It only adds edges whose filtration index is greater than the specified value.
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to perform the operation on
        minFiltrationIndex - the minimum filtration index
        Returns:
        the 1-skeleton of the complex in the form of an undirected graph

      • getNeighborhoodGraph

        This function returns the 1-skeleton of a filtered simplicial complex in the form of an undirected graph.
        Parameters:
        stream - the stream to perform the operation on
        Returns:
        the 1-skeleton of the complex

      • alexanderWhitneyDiagonal

        public static java.util.List<edu.stanford.math.primitivelib.autogen.pair.ObjectObjectPair<Simplex,Simplex>> alexanderWhitneyDiagonal(Simplex simplex)
        This function computes the Alexander-Whitney diagonal map of a given simplex defined by Delta([v_0, ... v_n]) = sum_i [v_0, ... v_i] tensor [v_i, ... v_n]
        Parameters:
        simplex - the simplex argument
        Returns:
        the Alexander-Whitney diagonal map of the given simplex
